message.raw:
Fixed memory leak with dialogs.

You should either:
* call dialog.setAttribute(Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose,True) if you don't need to access the dialog once the user closes the dialog, or
* call dialog.deleteLater() once you have finished with the dialog

If you do not, the memory will not be cleared properly and your application will likely crash randomly after the dialog is closed.

message:
Fixed memory leak with dialogs.

You should either:
* call dialog.setAttribute(Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose,True) if you don't need to access the dialog once the user closes the dialog, or
* call dialog.deleteLater() once you have finished with the dialog

If you do not, the memory will not be cleared properly and your application will likely crash randomly after the dialog is closed.
